ygData.subject: Soloing EW questions
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, gonna drop the beans here and admit it, I suck at soloing. I want to be versatile and be able to do all the class can do (which in our case is a whole
ygData.messageBody:
OK, gonna drop the beans here and admit it, I suck at soloing.

I want to be versatile and be able to do all the class can do (which in our
case is a whole lot)... so..

Am currently 37, was going to wait to solo until I got chant of
flame... but maybe I can get 38 in EW?

I have MM drums and decent equipment, but nothing outrageous.

What do you solo there and what techniques, I'm very veyr interested. My
wife's sick to death of OT and is going to drag her warrior over to velious
soon, so thought this would be very pertinent info for me.

Thanks ahead of time,

Raub Zaumbie
E. Marr server
